name: 1-Dataset
content:
Dataset Understanding


The dataset used in this project contains detailed information about various properties, including their attributes and historical sales data. Below is a summary of the dataset:


Attributes :

  • id: Unique identifier for each property.
  • date: Date of sale or listing.
  • price: Sale price of the property.
  • bedrooms: Number of bedrooms.
  • bathrooms: Number of bathrooms (can include fractional values).
  • sqft_lot: Square footage of the property lot.
  • sqft_living: Square footage of living space.
  • floors: Number of floors in the property.
  • waterfront: Indicates whether the property has a waterfront view (binary: 0 or 1).
  • view: Quality of the view from the property (ranging from 0 to 4).
  • condition: Overall condition of the property (ranging from 1 to 5).
  • grade: Overall grade given to the property based on construction and design (ranging from 1 to 13).
  • sqft_above: Square footage of the home above ground.
  • sqft_basement: Square footage of the basement.
  • yr_built: Year the property was built.
  • yr_renovated: Year the property was last renovated (0 if never renovated).
  • zipcode: ZIP code of the property location.
  • lat: Latitude coordinate of the property.
  • long: Longitude coordinate of the property.
  • sqft_living15: Living room square footage of the nearest 15 houses.
  • sqft_lot15: Lot square footage of the nearest 15 houses.
description: Detailed information about various properties, including their attributes and historical sales data.
